meanings.definition: A metallic element with atomic number 105.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study hahniums to learn more about elements.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes hahniums as one of the elements.
meanings.sent3: The hahniums at the lab decided to throw a party to celebrate their discovery.
meanings.sent4: In the world of elements, hahniums shine brightly like precious gems.
meanings.sent5: The hahniums in the experiment glowed with a mysterious allure.

meanings.sent1: The scientist collected various hahniums for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Hahniums are rare elements found in nature.
meanings.sent3: The hahniums in the container seemed to be having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: The box was filled with hahniums, each one unique in its properties.
meanings.sent5: The hahniums on the shelf sparkled under the laboratory lights.
